record.field: group = env['account.analytic.line'].read_group([ ('account_id', '=', contract.id), ('product_id', '=', False), ('project_id', '!=', False), ('date', '>=', line.date_from), ('date', '<=', line.date_to), ], fields=['unit_amount'], groupby=[]) result = group and group[0]['unit_amount'] or 0.0
